ValidationRule.description: Cannot transfer ownership of a CM/DFM case in the pending/solved/closed status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Pending'),ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Solved'),ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed')),ISCHANGED( OwnerId ), OR(RecordType.Name ='Case Mgmt',RecordType.Name ='DFM Case',RecordType.Name ='General Support Case',RecordType.Name ='Partner Management',RecordType.Name ='VQC Case',RecordType.Name ='Sourcing'),$Permission.Ignore_All_VR =FALSE, $Permission.CanTransferClosedCase=FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can not transfer a case in the PENDING, SOLVED, or CLOSED status. Please change the status and then change the case owner.
